entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
